body_html:
It seems you were looking at the documentation for release 0.12 but running 1.3.
Note that, as per semantic versioning followed by TensorFlow - there were no API stability guarantees for versions prior to 1.0

If you're using release 1.3, then please refer to the documentation for that version, which mentions that there is no pdf field/function.

Hope that helps.
Please feel free to re-open if I'm mistaken.

Thanks.

body:
It seems you were looking at the documentation for release 0.12 but running 1.3.
Note that, as per [semantic versioning](http://semver.org/) followed [by TensorFlow](https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/version_compat) - there were no API stability guarantees for versions prior to 1.0

If you're using release 1.3, then please refer to the [documentation for that version](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.3/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/distributions/MultivariateNormalDiag), which mentions that there is no `pdf` field/function.

Hope that helps.
Please feel free to re-open if I'm mistaken.

Thanks.
